get.summary: Show the main application page with a list of all applications.

parameters.description: Id of the application

delete.summary: Update the application with the given id.

get.summary:
The main endpoint for OAuth 2 authorization code flow.
If the user is not authenticated, the user will be redirected to the signin page.
If user is authenticated, the confirmation will be shown.

parameters.name: chooseAccount
parameters.description: Indicates whether the user should be prompted with account chooser

post.summary: Endpoint handling the OpenId Connect authorization request.

get.summary: Show the view to confirm the consent of the user to sing out.

parameters.name: FullLogout
parameters.description: Indicates if the user should be sign out also from the CleanIAM.

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters to be passed to the end session endpoint.

get.summary:
Show the view to confirm the consent of the user to sing out.
Just a fallback in case the client application did not provide a redirect URI.
The main endpoint for OpenId Connect userinfo requests.

post.summary: The main endpoint for OpenId Connect userinfo requests.

get.summary: Show a page announcing that email verification is required

post.summary: Handle the user requesting email for email verification

get.summary: Handle the user clicking on the email verification link

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the verification request

get.summary: Initiates the authentication process with Microsoft provider
Finalizes the authentication process with external signin provider
Show the form where the user fills in his email, and if the email is valid, a password reset request is sent.

post.summary: Handle the form submission with email for the password reset request.

get.summary: Show the form where the user can set a new password.
get.description: User is redirected to this page via a link in email

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Id of the reset password request

post.summary: Handle the form submission with new password for the password reset request.

id.description: Gets or sets the id associated with the application.

clientId.description: Gets or sets the client identifier associated with the application.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name associated with the application.

postLogoutRedirectUris.description: Gets the post-logout redirect URIs associated with the application.

redirectUris.description: Gets the redirect URIs associated with the application.

id.description: The unique identifier for the tenant.

ApiTenantModel.description: Represents a tenant in the system.

emailVerified.description: Indicates whether the user's email has been verified.

isDisabled.description: Indicates whether the user account is disabled.

isMFAEnabled.description: Indicates whether the user has enabled multifactor authentication (MFA).

isMFAConfigured.description: Indicates whether the user has configured multifactor authentication (MFA).

isInvitePending.description: Indicates whether the user has a pending invite or the profile is already set up.

totp.description: Totp code to verify the user has successfully connected to some authenticator app

enableMfa.description: Enable or disable MFA of the totp code is successfully verified

clientId.description: Gets or sets the client identifier associated with the application.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name associated with the application.

postLogoutRedirectUris.description: Gets the post-logout redirect URIs associated with the application.

redirectUris.description: Gets the redirect URIs associated with the application.

CreateNewTenantRequest.description: Request to create a new tenant

firstName.description: First name of the invited user

lastName.description: Last name of the invited user

InviteUserRequest.description: Request model for inviting a user.

qrCode.description:
QrCode with totp configuration string
Represents PNG image in Base64 format

MfaConfigurationResponse.description: Response model for MFA configuration flow

MfaDisabledForUser.description: Represents the event of user disabling multifactor authentication (MFA).

mfaEnabled.description: Indicates whether MFA is enabled or not

NewTenantCreated.description: Event that is raised when a new tenant is created

UserAssignedToTenant.description: Event that is raised when a user is assigned to a tenant
